q: , damaged in the shooting, is bandaged.) For about 30 seconds, Gabrielle Giffords struggled, before finally opening her eye wide and straining to focus on her friends, husband, parents and doctor. We knew she could hear and understand what we were saying, Kirsten Gillibrand told reporters traveling back to Washington with the president Thursday morning.
